name: Birdcage
description: A small wire cage for housing a bird.

name: Bit and Bridle
description: Standard equipment used to direct a mount.

name: Falconry Glove
description: A heavy leather glove used by falconers.

name: Feed
description: Standard feed typically consumed by a mount per day.

name: Dragonmeal
description: Standard feed typically consumed by a draconic mount per day.

name: Saddle, pack
description: A standard saddle for a pack mount.  A mount wearing a pack saddle cannot be ridden by a creature.

name: Saddle, riding
description: A standard saddle for a riding mount.

name: Saddle, riding (military)
description: A standard saddle for a riding mount.  You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid falling out of this saddle.

name: Saddle, exotic
description: An exotic saddle is required for riding any aquatic or flying mount that is not also draconic in nature.

name: Saddle, exotic (military)
description: An exotic saddle is required for riding any aquatic or flying mount that is not also draconic in nature.  You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid falling out of this saddle.

name: Saddle, dragonrider's
description: A heavily padded saddle specialized for riding draconic creatures.

name: Saddle, dragonrider's (military)
description: A heavily padded saddle specialized for riding draconic creatures.  You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid falling out of this saddle.

name: Saddlebags
description: Standard saddlebags that can be attached to a mount's saddle.
